Class TomcatEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.modcluster.container.tomcat.TomcatEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Engine
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TomcatEngine

    public class TomcatEngine
extends Object
implements Engine
    Engine implementation that wraps a Context.

    Paul Ferraro
